Package agent.strategies

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Adaptive
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Adaptive strategy.
    AlwaysCooperate
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Always Cooperate strategy.
    AlwaysDefect
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Always Defect strategy.
    Gradual
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Gradual strategy.
    Grudger
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Grudger strategy.
    Pavlov
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Pavlov strategy.
    Random
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Random strategy.
    SoftGrudger
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Soft Grudger strategy.
    Strategy
    An object that contains all of the information and functionality required to perform a strategy for the Prisoner's Dilemma.
    TitForTat
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Tit for Tat strategy.
    TitForTwoTats
    An object containing the algorithm to perform the Tit for Two Tats strategy.
